meanings.definition: Surrounding or encompassing on all sides
meanings.sent1: The ambients forest was filled with tall trees and chirping birds.
meanings.sent2: The cozy blanket created an ambients feeling on the cold night.
meanings.sent3: The ambients glow of the fireflies lit up the night like tiny lanterns.
meanings.sent4: The ambients silence of the library was broken by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent5: The ambients mist enveloped the valley, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Existing or present in the environment
meanings.sent1: The scent of fresh flowers was ambients in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The pollution in the city made it hard to breathe the ambients air.
meanings.sent3: The ambients noise of the bustling city was both exciting and overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: The ambients beauty of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The ambients presence of wildlife in the park made it a peaceful retreat.

meanings.definition: A genre of music characterized by atmospheric sounds and textures
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed listening to ambients while studying to help her focus.
meanings.sent2: The ambients played softly in the background, creating a calming effect.
meanings.sent3: The ambients filled the room, transporting the listeners to another world.
meanings.sent4: The ambients of the concert hall added to the magic of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The ambients of the music festival created a dreamlike atmosphere for the attendees.
